Text:
Not sure if related to the crack but, after running this on an infected x86 XP machine, EXE file association broke (was running EXEs fine prior to using HMP except for scareware infection).  Had to do some registry bashing to get them working again.

Cleaned the infection ok though which is the important thing, and it worked even though the machine had a previously-expired 30-day freebie license, blocking the legit HMP from fixing.

Anyone know how to remove the 30-day license flag?  Deleted all keys and values containing the strings "SurfRight" and "Hitman" but that didn't work.

Thanks for the upload Anacondaz.
That should have read "Deleted all REGISTRY keys and values" in case not obvious...
Thank you so much Anacondaz, Torrent was clean, scanned with norton and superantispyware. Easy peasy. Will seed
I don't get an 'Activate free license' button... Can someone please help?
